summary:
The term "Mafia" describes criminal groups like the original Sicilian Mafia or Italian-American Mafia. They settle disputes between criminals and enforce illegal deals with threats or violence. These groups also do other illegal things like gambling and drug trafficking.

The word "Mafia" was first used for the Sicilian Mafia but now includes other similar groups worldwide. Different Mafia organizations have their own names, like "Cosa Nostra" for the Sicilian and Italian-American Mafias. Today, the 'Ndrangheta from Calabria, Italy, is considered the most powerful and wealthy Mafia group.
title: Mafia
